--- In gladiator@y..., "Deathifier" <storey@t...> wrote:
> Wasn't it uploaded to the Yahoo user group space in multiple files?

Yes.  However, some people have limited access to the internet and 
don't have the time to download it completely.  Or like me, their 
browser stops downloading before all the file is saved to their 
computer for an unknown reason every time.
